text: Stayfree is a brand of feminine hygiene products, including maxi pads, ultra thin pads, and female wipes. On July 31, 2013, Energizer bought Stayfree from Johnson & Johnson. The purchase was only for the brands in North America – Johnson & Johnson continues to own the brands in all other regions of the world.http://www.bizjournals.com/stlouis/blog/2013/07/energizer-to- pay-185-million-for.html ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Feminine hygiene brands Category:Edgewell Personal Care
title: Stayfree
